text:
これちょっとおもろいなっておもったw
<https://twitter.com/fatih/status/1152571658680643584>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/fatih|@fatih>: Let me share one trick I do often for CLI/tools. I print the lines in a way that I can copy the line and append to vim:

vim genny/docker/docker.go +11

This opens the file and puts the cursor on line 11 for me! Makes things a lot of easier during debugging. #vim #golang <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/D_7Bz6AXUAA4ang.jpg>
attachments.text:
Let me share one trick I do often for CLI/tools. I print the lines in a way that I can copy the line and append to vim:

vim genny/docker/docker.go +11

This opens the file and puts the cursor on line 11 for me! Makes things a lot of easier during debugging. #vim #golang <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/D_7Bz6AXUAA4ang.jpg>

text: Vim以外でもみることを考えるとうーんってw
あー、これエラーのある個所をこういう表記にしておけば `vim ` の後に貼り付けてそのまま開けるぜって話かw
